name: spear
description: Choose a player on your current node and deal 12 damage to him or her.

name: map hack

name: titanium sword

name: electrolaser

name: nuke
description: Place it at your current node. For the following 2 days (today and tomorrow), after Action Phase, 55 damage will be dealt to every player (including yourself) on the node. May be used during Travelling Phase (including during travelling).

name: energy pot xl
description: Increases your energy today by 6. May only be used during Construction Phase.

name: body swapper

name: freeze bomb
description: All players (excluding you) on your current node will be unable to walk on the next day. May only be used after you finished travelling during Travelling Phase.

name: railgun
description: All players excluding you on your current node will be dealt 66 damage each. May only be used after you finished travelling during Travelling Phase.

name: raining bombs
description: 130 damage will be splitted evenly and dealt to players on your current node (excluding you), rounded down. May only be used after you finished travelling during Travelling Phase.
